name: NodeJS by Namastedev
description: Comprehensive Node.js course by namastedev covering fundamentals to advanced backend development, including Express, MongoDB, authentication, real-time features, and production deployment

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 00: Welcome to NamasteNodeJS
topics.description: Introduction to the course, roadmap, and what you'll learn in this comprehensive NodeJS journey

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 01: Introduction to NodeJS
topics.description: Understanding what NodeJS is, its history, and why it's revolutionary for JavaScript development

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 02: JS on Server
topics.description: Understanding how JavaScript runs on the server-side and the differences from client-side execution

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 03: Let's write code
topics.description: Writing your first NodeJS programs and understanding the development workflow

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 04: module.export & require
topics.description: Understanding NodeJS module system, exports, and require mechanism

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 05: Diving into the NodeJS github repo
topics.description: Exploring NodeJS source code, understanding its architecture and contribution process

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 06: libuv & async IO
topics.description: Deep dive into libuv library and asynchronous I/O operations in NodeJS

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 07: sync, async, setTimeoutZero - code
topics.description: Understanding synchronous vs asynchronous code execution and timeout mechanisms

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 08: Deep dive into v8 JS Engine
topics.description: Understanding V8 JavaScript engine, compilation, and optimization processes

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 09: libuv & Event Loop
topics.description: Comprehensive understanding of the event loop and its phases

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 10: Thread pool in libuv
topics.description: Understanding thread pool concepts and their role in NodeJS operations

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 11: Creating a Server
topics.description: Building your first HTTP server using NodeJS built-in modules

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 12: Databases - SQL & NoSQL
topics.description: Introduction to databases, understanding SQL vs NoSQL paradigms

topics.name: Season 1 Episode 13: Creating a database & mongodb
topics.description: Setting up MongoDB and understanding document-based database concepts

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 00: Introduction to Project
topics.description: Overview of the DevTinder project that will be built throughout the course

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 01: Microservices vs Monolith
topics.description: Understanding different architectural patterns and how to approach project building

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 02: Features, HLD, LLD & Planning
topics.description: High-level and low-level design concepts, feature planning and system architecture

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 03: Creating our Express Server
topics.description: Setting up Express.js server and understanding the Express framework

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 04: Routing and Request Handlers
topics.description: Advanced routing concepts and request handling in Express

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 05: Middlewares & Error Handlers
topics.description: Understanding middleware concept and implementing error handling

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 06: Database, Schema & Models | Mongoose
topics.description: Integrating MongoDB with Express using Mongoose ODM

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 07: Diving into the APIs
topics.description: Building RESTful APIs and understanding API design principles

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 08: Data Sanitization & Schema Validations
topics.description: Implementing data validation and sanitization for security

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 09: Encrypting Passwords
topics.description: Implementing secure password hashing and encryption

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 10: Authentication, JWT & Cookies
topics.description: Implementing authentication using JWT tokens and cookie management

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 11: Diving into the APIs and express Router
topics.description: Advanced API development and Express Router for modular routing

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 12: Logical DB Query & Compound Indexes
topics.description: Advanced database queries and performance optimization with indexes

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 13: ref, Populate & Thought process of writing APIs
topics.description: Database relationships, population, and API design thinking

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 14: Building Feed API & Pagination
topics.description: Building complex feed APIs with pagination and filtering

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 15: DevTinder UI - Part 1
topics.description: Starting the frontend development for DevTinder application

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 16: DevTinder UI - Part 2
topics.description: Continuing UI development with more complex components

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 17: DevTinder UI - Part 3
topics.description: Building core features and user interactions

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 18: DevTinder UI - Part 4
topics.description: Advanced UI features and user experience improvements

topics.name: Season 2 Episode 19: DevTinder UI - Part 5
topics.description: Finalizing the UI and connecting all components

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 01: Launching AWS Instance and deploying frontend
topics.description: Setting up AWS EC2 instance and deploying frontend application

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 02: Nginx & Backend Node App Deployment
topics.description: Configuring Nginx as reverse proxy and deploying NodeJS backend

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 03: Adding a Custom Domain Name
topics.description: Setting up custom domain and SSL certificates

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 04: Sending Emails using Amazon SES
topics.description: Implementing email functionality using AWS Simple Email Service

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 05: Keeping Our Credentials Safe Using dotenv Files
topics.description: Environment variable management and security best practices

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 06: Scheduling Cron Jobs
topics.description: Implementing scheduled tasks and background jobs

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 07: Payment Gateway Integration ft. Razorpay
topics.description: Integrating payment processing with Razorpay

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 08: Web Sockets & socket.io
topics.description: Implementing real-time communication with WebSockets

topics.name: Season 3 Episode 09: Building Real-time Live Chat Feature
topics.description: Building a complete real-time chat system

topics.name: Nginx Configuration Optimization
topics.description: Advanced Nginx configuration and performance optimization

topics.name: Production Monitoring & Logging
topics.description: Implementing comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions

topics.name: Scalability & Performance Optimization
topics.description: Optimizing application for scale and performance

topics.name: Security Hardening & Best Practices
topics.description: Implementing security best practices and hardening

topics.name: CI/CD & Deployment Automation
topics.description: Setting up continuous integration and deployment pipelines
